description:
The goal is to get the crystals on the 3D stage by making full use of jumps and dashes.

Game features
・When you get the crystal, the stage is cleared!
・There are two modes: normal and hard mode.
・Local multiplayer with split screen for up to 4 people!
・You can use items to increase your speed and change your jump height.

hard mode
・Collect coins to make crystals appear!
・If the gimmick changes or the starting position changes, it becomes difficult to clear the stage.

multiplayer
・The first player to get the crystal wins!
・You can lift your opponent, throw them to disturb them, and cooperate with them!


[Controls]
■ Title screen
Left stick…Cursor movement
Left stick … Change the difficulty of the stage or the number of players or options
B…Decision
Y…Skip by 10 units (hold down)

■ Game screen
Left stick…move
Right stick…Rotate camera
B…Jump
Y…Dash (while moving)
X...Pick up (Pick up other players by throwing)
Plus... open menu
Minux…Tips
R... Reset camera
L…Camera zoom
Y+B+A … self-destruct and return to the halfway position
Y+B+A+X … self-destruct and return to starting position

■ Menu screen
Left stick…Cursor movement
B…Decision
name: CRYSTORLD
intro:
Get the crystal!
Over 120 stages!
Play with 4 players in local split screen!
